Property.name: Menu
Property.HelpText: This will add a camera submenu to the pause menu. Note that it replaces the leaderboard entry.

Property.name: MinDist
Property.HelpText: The closest distance that the camera can be from the player.

Property.name: MaxDist
Property.HelpText: The farthest distance that the camera can be from the player.

Property.name: AnalogThreshold
Property.HelpText: The sensitivity when using the right analog or LR triggers.

Property.name: AnalogMaxSpeed
Property.HelpText: The maximum speed at which the camera can rotate when using the right analog or LR triggers.
